video.title: Korean Peninsula
video.synopsis: Set in a unified Korea, the political drama unmasks a covert war between the powers as they battle to control the country's resources and technology.

episodes.synopsis: The 1st inter-Korea summit since Korea's division takes place in Seoul! There are many other signs that the two Koreas will finally achieve peace.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Watching a soccer game between the One-Korea team and Austrailia, South and North Korean agents start fighting and end up pointing guns at each other.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A fire breaks out on the base, and Myung-joon decides to expel the negligent North Korean technicians responsible for it. But another accident occurs.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: North Korea takes over the base and orders Myung-joon to pledge allegiance. Myung-joon learns that core technology is in their hands due to Jin-jae.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: As President Kang falls into a coma 6 months before the election for his 2nd term, the opposing party's Chang-il becomes the most promising candidate.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The weapons that were supposed to be received from Russia in return for the core technology begin to cross the North Korean border!
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Members of the North Korean coup head to the secret lab with Jin-jae to sell core technology to Russia, while planning to kill her soon after.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Myung-joon escapes the secret lab with Jin-jae. Jin-jae gets injured and tells him to leave without her, handing him a disk with core technology.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: On the run with a digital disk that contains core technology, Myung-joon and Jin-jae plan to cross the border. In Romania, an intelligence war begins.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Myung-joon became a hero after retrieving the core technology. But there's nothing left for him to do in the lab. So he decides to run for President.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Myung-joon's statement that North Korea cannot be defined as an enemy becomes controversial. But it comes from his belief in peace and reunification.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Upon receiving the news that Jin-jae's father was executed, Myung-joon drives to Panmunjom. He despairs as Jin-jae may be the next target.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Myung-joon joins a memorial by himself, and the bereaved families forgive him. His approval ratings go up again, but a new obstacle awaits him.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Dong-ki offers Myung-joon's picture to Jin-jae, saying that Myung-joon no longer cares about his safety. In the picture, Myung-joon looks happy…
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Word gets out about the Tree of Hope, and it soon goes viral. People all over the country posts pictures of their own Trees of Hope on social media.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: A big festival ends successfully. The Vice President gives up on the presidential candidacy for Myung-joon who then suggests he be his running mate.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Reports come out that Jin-jae and Myung-joon are lovers. Reporters stake out Myung-joon's house, but he refuses to answer any of their questions.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Jin-jae sends Myung-joon back, telling him not to look for her again. But she asks him to follow up on an earlier request and work for reunification.
episodes.title: Episode 18
